title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press 'Finish' in the JAR packager wizard, it reports the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: After pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager wizard, it displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even if there are unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, the wizard should prompt me to save the files before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JAR packager wizard. 2. Ensure that there are unsaved editors. 3. Fill in all the required fields. 4. Click on the 'Finish' button.
